fulltext:
Lê Văn Hoàng 
Senior Software engineer 
20-10-1992 
ㅡ 
Summary 
I am a software engineer with 5 years of experience in .NET 
technologies, with knowledge of Object-Oriented programming. 
I am a hard-working, responsive and enthusiastic person. I am 
well-organized and work well under pressure. I really enjoy working 
with teamwork and I can also work on my own very effectively.  
Eager to learn new technologies is what I am passionate about. 
ㅡ 
Skills 
I have 5 years of experiences in C#, .NET, building window 
applications, web applications with ASP.NET MVC, include front end 
framework like jquery, knockout js.  
Experiences of logical and physical data modeling and relational 
database technologies( i.e SQL stored procedures, Entity 
Framework, LINQ).  
Experiences in database performance optimization. 
Experiences working with Amazon web services(DynamoDB, S3, 
EC2,...), Azure(WebJobs, Azure Functions, ...). 
Experiences with Agile and Scrum development process. 
Good analysis, logic thinking, problem-solving skills. 
Hard-working, well-organized and high sense of responsibility. 
High learning spirit, and eager to learn the new technologies. 
ㅡ 
Experiences 
JobLogic - Senior .NET Software engineer 
Feb 2019 - PRESENT 
Develop new features, and maintain web applications. 
Responsibility for deploy LIVE every Monday. 
Deploy and monitor the system to catch up on the issues. 
Working with Azure technologies, research the new 
technologies applied to project, like using Azure functions 
instead of WebJobs.  
Monitor the junior engineer, review the code for other 
members. 
Technologies: 
●
ASP.NET MVC, ASP.NET Web API, .NET Core, 
Microservices. 
●
Azure WebJob, Azure Functions, Azure service bus, … 
●
Entity Framework, SQL, Stored procedures. 
●
Ninject, Unit testing, Integration testing. 
●
TFS, CICD, Jira 
Poeta Digital - Senior Software engineer 
April 2017 - Feb 2019 
Develop, upgrade, deploy, and maintain the education web 
application. 
Coordinate the design and implementation of various applications, 
including collaboration with project managers, client representative, 
and development team. 
Monitor the system to catch up on the issues and fixed the 
problems. 
Increase the system performance by detecting the slow, bad SQL 
queries, stored procedures, and optimized those. 
Collaborate with team to define and improve the team’s workflow. 
Decrease 40% time to deploy by using Jenkins for automation 
building and deploying project.  
Monitor the junior engineer, review code for other team members 
and share my knowledge with the team. 
Technologies: 
●
ASP.NET MVC, ASP.NET Web API, Window services, 
Windows applications. 
●
Amazon web services, S3, DynamoDB, EC2 
●
SQL Server, Stored procedures, Entity framework. 
Aswig Solutions - Software engineer 
August 2015 - April 2017 
Has 3 months working with Microsoft Biztalk server. 
Develop and maintain the web application to manage the claim 
insurance.  
Get familiar to follow the Agile and Scrum development process. 
Technologies: 
●
ASP.NET MVC, ASP.NET Web API. 
●
OOP, SOLID principle, design pattern. 
●
Entity Framework, SQL Server. 
ABCV - Junior engineer 
July 2014 - August 2015 
Maintenance the ASP.NET Web Form application, detect and correct 
errors, improve performance  
Work on a team to build the internal web application from the 
ground up to release, using ASP.NET MVC, Entity framework, 
Bootstrap, and Jquery. 
Research and build the backend server system using ASP.NET Web 
API 2, integrated with a mobile application. 
ㅡ 
Education 
Ho Chi Minh University of Science 
2010 – 2014  Major: Information Technology / Engineering.
